Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to vendor fees paid to certain vendor tracks
Summary: Provides vendor fees for vendor tracks located in the county of Genesee and within forty miles of a Native American class III gaming facility.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to vendor fees paid to certain vendor tracks
